subject: Re: [junit] how to lunch my Junit test case from IBM application client
msgSnippet: ... Try this: your main method... { junit.textui.TestRunner.main(new String[] { com.mycom.test.MyTest }); } -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
xiangwb wrote:

> Hi all,
> I have a Junit test case. I want to lunch it from WebSphere
> applciation client becuase I need some environment setting. so I
> should have a class include Main. how do I call my Junittest case
> from main program. Thanks a lot.

Try this:

your main method... {
junit.textui.TestRunner.main(new String[] {
"com.mycom.test.MyTest"});
}
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
